title: How do I obtain bootloader unlock permissions?
answer:
Please visit [Request unlock code](https://hwid5.vmall.com/oauth2/portal/cloud_login.jsp?lang=en-us&validated=true&service=http%3A%2F%2Femui.huawei.com%2Fen%2Fplugin.php%3Fid%3Dhwlogin%3Avalidate%26ru%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Femui.huawei.com%252Fen%252Fplugin.php%253Fid%253Dhwdownload%2526mod%253Dlist&loginChannel=22000000&reqClientType=2023&adUrl=http%3A%2F%2Femui.huawei.com%2Fen%2Fsource%2Fplugin%2Fhwlogin%2Flogin.php) to request an official unlock code. Follow the instructions on the page to unlock your bootloader. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=87124)

 Please read the unlocking disclaimer displayed on the website carefully.
keywords: obtain root permissions, unlock permissions, unlock
